text: Take three sips if you have ever wanted to be an influencer.
Take a sip if you are wearing odd socks.
[Name], say the names of all other players. Take a sip for every wrong name. If you get them all right, give out three sips.
Take two sips if you have ever deleted an Instagram post because it didn't get enough likes.
Take a sip if you have ever cried your makeup off.
Take a sip if you have ever yelled at a receptionist, retail worker or waiter.
Take two sips if you have ever dined and dashed, you cheapskate.
Take a sip if you don't like a member of your SO's family.
Take a sip if you have ever cheated on an exam.
Take a sip if you have ever sent a text to the wrong person.
Try to lick your elbow. If you can’t, take a sip.
[Name], do three push-ups or take three sips.
[Name], say the alphabet backwards. Drink every time you mess up or take too long.
Take a sip for every month it's been since you last read a book.
[Name], if you've ever blacked out, your next sips go to the person to your left. Take it easy tonight, yeah?
If you are in university, take two sips.
Take two sips if you bite your fingernails. Down your drink if you bite your toenails too.
[Name] take 3 sips if you have ever been to a different country, otherwise give them out
[Name] down your drink if you have a tattoo, otherwise give it out
Take 2 sips if you have ever ridden a rollercoaster, otherwise give them out
Down your drink if you have ever bungee jumped
[Name] give out 3 sips if you have ever been in a car accident, otherwise take them
Take 4 sips if you have a phobia
Would you rather eat a live cockroach or be bald? Everyone vote at the same time, losing group drinks 2 times
Around the room, name your ex relationships/hookups one at a time. The first person to run out of names, drink 3 times. [Name] you start
What rhymes with “itch”, first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 5 times. [Name] you start
To spice things up, fireman or soldier? Vote at the same time, losing group drink 4 times
[Name] down your drink if you have ever gone skydiving, otherwise give it out
[Name] give out 2 sips if you have ever broken a bone, otherwise take them
Bottoms up! People with an S in their first name, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who prefer coffee over tea, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who have been to a music festival, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who prefer dogs over cats, let's down it all!
take 5 sips if you have a fear of public speaking, otherwise give them out
Down your drink if you have ever played a sport at a professional level
Bottoms up! People who have a birthday this week, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who are of Irish descent, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who have watched all seasons of Game of Thrones, let's down it all!
[Name] take 2 sips if you are Irish, otherwise give them out
Take 2 sips if you are Polish
Take 2 sips if you are American
Take 2 sips if you are Romanian
Take 2 sips if you are mixed background
[Name] take 2 sips if you are in your early 20s, otherwise give them out
Take 2 sips if you love formula one
[Name] take 2 sips if you spend money excessively, otherwise give them out
Take 3 sips if you have a job in finance
Take 3 sips if you have a job in tech
Take 3 sips if you have a job in healthcare
Take 3 sips if you have a job in education
Take 3 sips if you have a job in the legal field
Famous Landmarks, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 4 times. [Name] you start
Types of Fruit, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 3 times. [Name] you start
Bottoms up! People who can speak more than 3 languages, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who celebrate St. Patrick's Day, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who have watched all seasons of The Office, let's down it all!
Bottoms up! People who have a birthday in March, let's down it all!
Bands from the 90s, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 5 times. [Name] you start
Sports Teams, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 2 times. [Name] you start
Give out 3 sips if you have a job in the retail industry, otherwise take them
Give out 3 sips if you have a job in the hospitality industry, otherwise take them
Give out 3 sips if you have a job in the creative industry, otherwise take them
Play never have I ever: players take turns saying something they have never done, and anyone who has done it must take a drink, [Name] you start
Play quarters: players take turns trying to bounce a quarter off a table and into a cup. If they make it, they choose someone to drink. If they miss, they must drink. [Name] you start
Musical Artists, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 4 times. [Name] you start
Movies, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 3 times. [Name] you start
Cities, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 5 times. [Name] you start
Ice Cream Flavors, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of any more must drink 2 times. [Name] you start
Hurling teams, the first to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drink 2 times. [Name] you start
Things that are popular to eat at the beach, the first to run out of ideas drink 3 times. [Name] you start
The last person to have eaten fast food must drink 3 times
Those who prefer coffee over tea must drink 4 times
The person with the shortest hair must drink 2 times
Drink 3 times if you've ever slept through your alarm
The person with the most siblings must drink 5 times
Those who have never been to a music festival must drink 3 times
Drink 2 times if you've ever lost a bet
The person with the most Instagram followers must drink 4 times
Those who use Twitter drink 4 times
Those who have never watched a full episode of Two Broke Girls, drink 2 times. Drink 1 more if you have watched a whole season.
3 sips to the last person to have opened a beer
Cheese or meat? Vote at the same time, losers drink 2 times
The person with the most instagram followers, drink 2 times
[Name] give out 2 sips to a player bigger than you, if it's impossible, drink them
If you haven't taken a shower today drink 4 times!
Those who didn't want to play Drinking Democracy drink 4 times. Such a shame
If you are a smoker drink 3 times
Things with holes, first to run out of ideas drink 4 times, [Name] you start
[Name] ask a question to the room at large. The first person to answer can give out 5 sips
Go around the room, do a gesture after repeating the gestures done so far. The loser drinks 2 times! [Name] you start
[Name] say a letter. Everyone keeps adding a letter until a word is made, the person who makes the word drinks 2 times
Drink 4 times if you are wearing a hat right now
Drink 3 times if you have a tattoo
Drink 1 time if you've ever kissed someone while standing on one foot
[Name], give out 4 sips to a player thinner than you… If it's impossible, drink them
The player who dated the worst girl ever drinks 3 times
Everyone take as many sips as the amount of years you studied after secondary school
Everyone with the letter “a” in their first name drink 2 times
[Name], play the beginning of the last song you listened to on your phone. If the majority of the players don't like it, drink 3 times
The player with the biggest bill in their wallet can give out 5 sips
If you're single, give 4 sips to one person
Go around the room, make your ears wiggle. Those who can't, drink 2 times. [Name] you start.
[Name], if your phone is in your pocket drink 4 times. Otherwise give out 4 sips
People with Android phones, drink 2 times
Would you rather have a pet unicorn or a pet dragon? Vote now, losing group drinks 3 times
Would you rather live in a castle or a treehouse? Vote now, losing group drinks 4 times
Would you rather be able to fly or be invisible? Vote now, losing group drinks 2 times
Would you rather live in the city or the countryside? Vote now, losing group drinks 3 times
Would you rather have a million dollars or true love? Vote now, losing group drinks 4 times
Would you rather live for a year in the past or the future? Vote now, losing group drinks 2 times
Would you rather be able to speak any language fluently or be able to play any instrument? Vote now, losing group drinks 3 times
Would you rather have a personal chef or a personal shopper? Vote now, losing group drinks 4 times
Would you rather have super strength or super speed? Vote now, losing group drinks 2 times
Would you rather have the ability to teleport or have a time machine? Vote now, losing group drinks 3 times
The last person to have ridden a motorcycle must drink 3 times
Those who have ever ridden in a helicopter must drink 2 times
The last person to have been on a hike must drink 3 times
